title: LQNN, Inc. Recalls Poultry, Beef and Pork Products Produced Without the Benefit of Inspection and Misbranded With Unauthorized Use of the USDA Mark of Inspection
summary: EDITORS NOTE: Details of this recall were updated on June 5, 2015 to reflect a change in pounds. WASHINGTON, May 20, 2015 LQNN, Inc., a Garden Grove, Calif. firm, added additional poundage to the recalled products list, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and...
